Lunarpine hears the words of RebelYell and walks out from underneath 
the s=
hip. He sets down the welding equipment he'd been using.

"Excuse me, you m=
ust be the new bot Spears told me about." he looked 
up at the taller bot, =
"Thats no way to make an entrance, thats a 
ladybot you're speaking to, try=
 a little respect." This new bot 
wasn't going to make any friends around t=
he Ark with that attitude 
and Lunarpine was letting him know it straight u=
p.

"My names Lunarpine." The bot extended his hand toward RebelYell.

(OOC=
 the proper term is What the PIT is going on on this slaggin 
rock: the Pit=
 is the cybertronian equivilant to our hell.)
